featureType.name: Similar_Places
featureType.title: Similar_Places
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: Similar_Places
virtualTable.sql: SELECT place.place_id, type.type_name, population, carbon, percapcarb, population_density_per_sq_km as popdensity, point, ft.biomass, ft.coal, ft.cogeneration, ft.gas, ft.geothermal, ft.hydro, ft.nuclear, ft.oil, ft.other, ft.petcoke, ft.solar, ft.storage, ft.waste, ft.wave_and_tidal, ft.wind, n.name, n_0.name as "nation_name", n_1.name as "state_name", n_2.name as "county_name" FROM public."PLACE_INFO" as place LEFT JOIN public."NAME_PLACE" as np ON place.place_id = np.place_id LEFT JOIN public."NAME" as n ON np.name_id = n.name_id LEFT JOIN public."NAME_PLACE" as np_0 on place.gadm_0_id = np_0.place_id JOIN public."NAME" as n_0 on np_0.name_id = n_0.name_id LEFT JOIN public."NAME_PLACE" as np_1 on place.gadm_1_id = np_1.place_id left JOIN public."NAME" as n_1 on np_1.name_id = n_1.name_id LEFT JOIN public."NAME_PLACE" as np_2 on place.gadm_2_id = np_2.place_id left JOIN public."NAME" as n_2 on np_2.name_id = n_2.name_id LEFT JOIN public."TYPE" as type on place.type_id = type.type_id LEFT JOIN public."FUEL_TYPES" as ft ON place.place_id = ft.place_id WHERE place.population >= %POPULATION_LOW% and place.population <= %POPULATION_HIGH% and (place.type_id = %TYPE_ID_1% OR place.type_id = %TYPE_ID_2% OR place.type_id = %TYPE_ID_3% OR place.type_id = %TYPE_ID_4%) and place.carbon >= %CARBON_LOW% and place.carbon <= %CARBON_HIGH% and place.percapcarb >= %PERCAP_CARBON_LOW% and place.percapcarb <= %PERCAP_CARBON_HIGH% and place.popdensity >= %POPULATION_DENSITY_LOW% and place.popdensity <= %POPULATION_DENSITY_HIGH%
